sections.forEach(section => { const sectionTop = section.offsetTop - navbar.offsetHeight; if (pageYOffset >= sectionTop) { current = section.getAttribute('id'); } }); navLinks.forEach(link => { link.classList.remove('active'); if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${current}`) { link.classList.add('active'); } }); }); // Carousel navigation const carousel = document.querySelector(".carousel__viewport"); const prevBtn = document.querySelector(".carousel__prev"); const nextBtn = document.querySelector(".carousel__next"); nextBtn.addEventListener("click", () => { carousel.scrollBy({ left: carousel.offsetWidth, behavior: "smooth" }); }); prevBtn.addEventListener("click", () => { carousel.scrollBy({ left: -carousel.offsetWidth, behavior: "smooth" }); }); // Carousel dot navigation and arrow logic document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.carousel__slide'); const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.carousel__dot'); const viewport = document.querySelector('.carousel__viewport'); const prevBtn = document.querySelector('.carousel__prev'); const nextBtn = document.querySelector('.carousel__next'); let current = 0; function setActive(index) { dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active')); if (dots[index]) dots[index].classList.add('active'); current = index; } // Dot click navigation dots.forEach((dot, idx) => { dot.addEventListener('click', () => { viewport.scrollTo({ left: idx * viewport.offsetWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); }); }); // Arrow navigation if (prevBtn && nextBtn) { prevBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { let idx = Math.max(0, current - 1); viewport.scrollTo({ left: idx * viewport.offsetWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); }); nextBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { let idx = Math.min(slides.length - 1, current + 1); viewport.scrollTo({ left: idx * viewport.offsetWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); }); } // Update dot on scroll viewport.addEventListener('scroll', () => { const slideWidth = viewport.offsetWidth; const scrollLeft = viewport.scrollLeft; const idx = Math.round(scrollLeft / slideWidth); setActive(idx); }); // Set initial active dot setActive(0); }); // Modal logic document.querySelectorAll('.fav-card').forEach(card => { card.addEventListener('click', () => { const modalId = card.getAttribute('data-modal'); document.getElementById(modalId).style.display = 'flex'; }); }); document.querySelectorAll('.modal .close').forEach(btn => { btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => { e.target.closest('.modal').style.display = 'none'; parts.text: where in the code picks the fav card sizes?

response.value:
The fav card sizes are determined by the `.fav-card` CSS rules. Specifically, these properties control the size and shape:

- `width: 90%;`
- `max-width: 220px;`
- `height: 70px;` (for the image inside the card)
- `aspect-ratio: 4/3;` (in the earlier block, if present)
- In responsive media queries, `.fav-card` uses `max-width: 95vw; width: 98%;` for small screens.

You can adjust these properties in the `.fav-card` selector and the related media queries to change the card size.

* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;

#favs {
  padding: 2.5rem 0 2.5rem 0;
  background: #FF5F05;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}
.favs-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 10px;
  max-width: 1100px;
  margin: 2rem auto 2rem auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.fav-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  width: 100%;
  aspect-ratio: 4/3;
  min-width: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}
.fav-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}
.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;
}
.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem 0.5rem 0.2rem 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}
.fav-card .card-info h2 {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0.2rem 0 0.1rem 0;
  word-break: break-word;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 10px;
  }
  .fav-card {
    aspect-ratio: 4/3;
    width: 98vw;
    max-width: 99vw;
  }

  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  margin: 5px;
}

.carousel__navigation button:hover {
  background: #FF5F05;
}

/* Dot Navigation */
.carousel__dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
  gap: 12px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.carousel__dot {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border: 2px solid #FF5F05;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s, border 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
}
.carousel__dot.active {
  background: #FF5F05;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}
#favs {
  background: #FF5F05;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.favs-grid {

  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));

}

.fav-card {

}
.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;

  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  
}
.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .favs-grid {

toolCallRounds.response:
The fav card sizes are determined by the `.fav-card` CSS rules. Specifically, these properties control the size and shape:

- `width: 90%;`
- `max-width: 220px;`
- `height: 70px;` (for the image inside the card)
- `aspect-ratio: 4/3;` (in the earlier block, if present)
- In responsive media queries, `.fav-card` uses `max-width: 95vw; width: 98%;` for small screens.

You can adjust these properties in the `.fav-card` selector and the related media queries to change the card size.

The modal text (like "Ranking") may not show up because the modal's content is overflowing or being hidden due to CSS issues. In your SCSS, the `.modal-content` is inside a `.modal` that uses `display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;`, but if the modal or its parent has a fixed height or the content is too tall, some text can be cut off or hidden.

Also, if the modal is not set to scroll when content overflows, or if the modal's `max-width`/`width` is too small, the text may not fit and will be hidden.

To fix this, ensure your `.modal-content` allows vertical scrolling for overflow and has enough width for the text. For example, add:

/* Carousel Container */
.carousel {
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

/* Viewport */
.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE 10+ */
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  margin: 5px;
}

.carousel__navigation button:hover {
  background: #FF5F05;
}

/* Dot Navigation */
.carousel__dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
  gap: 12px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.carousel__dot {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border: 2px solid #FF5F05;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s, border 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
}
.carousel__dot.active {
  background: #FF5F05;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}
#favs {
  background: #FF5F05;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.favs-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 100vw;
  margin: 0 auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.fav-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  width: 90%;
  min-width: 0;
  height:90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}
.fav-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}
.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 150px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  
}
.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
    
  }
  .fav-card {
    max-width: 95vw;
    width: 98%;
    
  }
}
  /* Modal */
  .modal {
    display: none; /* Hidden by default */
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    inset: 0;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    
  }

  .modal-content {
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    max-width: 500px;
    width: 90%;
    text-align: center;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 90vh;
    color: black;

    img {
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 0.5rem;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
    }
  }

  .close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

Northern Cuisine

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style!

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range:$$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle love) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range:$

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

/* Navbar styles from main.scss */
#navbar {

  background-attachment: fixed;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  filter: contrast(50%) saturate(110%);
  z-index: 1;
}

#home > * {
  position: relative;

foot {

footer i, 
footer a i {
  color: #fff !important;
}

/* Carousel Container */
.carousel {
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

/* Viewport */
.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE 10+ */
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  margin: 5px;
}

.carousel__navigation button:hover {
  background: #FF5F05;
}

/* Dot Navigation */
.carousel__dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
  gap: 12px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.carousel__dot {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border: 2px solid #FF5F05;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s, border 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
}
.carousel__dot.active {
  background: #FF5F05;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}
#favs {
  background: #FF5F05;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.favs-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 100vw;
  margin: 0 auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.fav-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  width: 90%;
  min-width: 0;
  height:90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}
.fav-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}
.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 150px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  
}
.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
    
  }
  .fav-card {
    max-width: 95vw;
    width: 98%;
    
  }
}
  /* Modal */
  .modal {
    display: none; /* Hidden by default */
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    inset: 0;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    
  }

  .modal-content {
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    max-width: 500px;
    width: 90%;
    text-align: center;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 90vh;
    color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

    img {
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 0.5rem;
    }
  }

  .close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
</attachment>

food-ism
  • home

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

renderedUserMessage.text:
food-ism
food-ism
  • home
  • about
  • featured
  • my favs

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

food-ism
  • home
  • about
  • featured
  • my favs

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

© naomil4@illinois.edu

Shawarma Joint

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

/* Carousel Container */
.carousel {
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

/* Viewport */
.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE 10+ */
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;

/* Carousel Container */
.carousel {
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

/* Viewport */
.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE 10+ */
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.favs-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 100vw;
  margin: 0 auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.fav-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  width: 90%;
  min-width: 0;
  height:90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}
.fav-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}
.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 150px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  
}
.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
    
  }
  .fav-card {
    max-width: 95vw;
    width: 98%;
    
  }
}
  /* Modal */
  .modal {
    display: none; /* Hidden by default */
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    inset: 0;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    
  }

  .modal-content {
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    max-width: 500px;
    width: 90%;
    text-align: center;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 90vh;
    color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

    img {
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 0.5rem;
    }
  }

  .close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

food-ism
  • home

  • my favs

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

ai

  • fdfdsfsd food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav dsfdsfds restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

food-ism

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

history

  • i've always loved eating from a young age!
  • there's nothing more comforting and energizing as a delicious meal to me

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

© naomil4@illinois.edu

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

Teamoji

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

/* Carousel Container */
.carousel {
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

/* Viewport */
.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE 10+ */
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
.about-left, .about-right {
  margin: 0;

  box-sizing: border-box;
}

    padding: 20px 10vw;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 600px;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 500px) {
  .about-text {
    padding: 10px 2vw;
  }
}
  display: flex;

section {

/* Carousel Container */
.carousel {
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

/* Viewport */
.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE 10+ */
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
}

/* Slides */
.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%; /* each slide fills viewport */
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Controls */
.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
.about-left, .about-right {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 40px 80px;
  flex: 1 1 320px;
  min-width: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

@media (max-width: 1100px) {
  .about-text {
    padding: 30px 40px;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 800px) {
  #about {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }
  .about-text {
    padding: 20px 10vw;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 600px;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 500px) {
  .about-text {
    padding: 10px 2vw;
  }
}
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
  gap: 12px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
#carousel .carousel__dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  margin: 0px 0 20px 0;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.carousel__dot {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border: 2px solid #FF5F05;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s, border 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
}
.carousel__dot.active {
  background: #FF5F05;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}
#favs {
  background: #FF5F05;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.favs-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 100vw;
  margin: 0 auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.fav-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  width: 90%;
  min-width: 0;
  height:90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}
.fav-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}
.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 150px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  
}
.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }
}
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .favs-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
    
  }
  .fav-card {
    max-width: 95vw;
    width: 98%;
    
  }
}

edits.text:
food-ism
  • home
  • about
  • featured
  • my favs
  • contact

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

history

  • i've always loved eating from a young age!
  • there's nothing more comforting and energizing as a delicious meal to me

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

contact

let me know if you agree/disagree with my takes

or if you have any new restaurant or dish recommendations!

i would love to hear!

naomil4@illinois.edu

a brief glimpse into uiuc
© naomil4@illinois.edu

welcome to uiuc, foodie!

a collection of the best food on campus < 3

about me

  • hello! i'm naomi, a junior at uiuc who loves to eat yummy food
  • on this website, i'll document my fav uiuc restaurants and my go-to orders at each place

history

  • i've always loved eating from a young age!
  • there's nothing more comforting and energizing as a delicious meal to me

my tastes

  • my fav cuisines are chinese, korean, and mediterranean
  • i love love soup noodles, anything spicy, and sweet treats
  • my weakness is a good deal

featured eats

Northern Cuisine

Kyo Matcha

Shawarma Joint

fav restaurants

Northern Cuisine

×

Northern Cuisine

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mapo tofu, sweet eggplant, pork intestines

Desc: very yummy & authentic, but pricy. good for big groups & family style! i go whenever i want to spoil myself

Kyo Matcha

×

Kyo Matcha

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: matcha brulee cream slush

Desc: very yummy, but pricy. i always get the same drink because it's so yummy!

Shawarma Joint

×

Shawarma Joint

Ranking: 4.8/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

Desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

Midsummer Lounge

×

Midsummer Lounge

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: A8 stewed beef consomme noodle

Desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

Zhangliang Malatang

×

Zhangliang Malatang

Ranking: 4.3/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

Desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

Ten Second Rice Noodle

×

Ten Second Rice Noodle

Ranking: 4.2/5

Price Range: $

Recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

Desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

Spoon House

×

Spoonhouse

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: army stew (budae jjigae)

Desc: i always get the budae jjigae and its so yummy and simple. one of my top comfort foods on campus < 3

Teamoji

×

Teamoji

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$$

Recommendations: mango coconut slushie with grapefruit & white peach lychee green tea

Desc: relatively expensive, but the drinks are big & i think its the best tasting boba on campus! their drinks also have a lot of included toppings

Mo's Burritos

×

Mo's Burritos

Ranking: 4.5/5

Price Range: $$

Recommendations: nachos supremo (& i've heard the birria tacos are yum)

Desc: the late night go-to food that actually tastes so good! best nachos i've ever had hehe. i miss it when i leave campus

let me know if you agree/disagree with my takes

or if you have any new restaurant or dish recommendations!

i would love to hear!

shawarma joint

shawarma joint

ranking: 4.8/5

recommendations: chicken shawarma bowl with chickpea salad & cauliflower & jerusalem salad

desc: a bowl by itself isn't super cheap, but you can eat it for 3 meals and its super yummy. it also comes with free pita & sauce. also i heard the lunch deal is really good w/ free fries & a drink

midsummer lounge

midsummer lounge

ranking: 4.5/5

desc: on the expensive side, but it's pretty good for when you're craving a soup noodle! i (big soup noodle lover) look for chewiness of noodle & depth of soup flavor, and this dish has both!

zhangliang malatang

zhangliang malatang

ranking: 4.3/5

price: $

recommendations: classic spicy malatang with wide glass noodles & beef slices

desc: super yummy (soup has good depth) and you can customize to your liking because it's diy! my bowls are usually $12 and it's a lot of food. the rating is docked tho because there were maggots in the food before...

ten second rice noodle

ten second rice noodle

ranking: 4.2/5

price: $

recommendations: hot pot sliced beef rice noodle & sour cabbage fish rice noodle

desc: most dishes are < $15 and the soup is yummy with depth and the noodles are always springy. lots of toppings in the soup and very filling.

spoon house

spoon house

message.text: why are my variables not working

response.value:
Your variables like $illini-orange are written in SCSS syntax, but you are using them in your CSS as background: illini-orange; (missing the $ and not inside a SCSS context). Also, if you are compiling to CSS, the output file will not have variables—they only work in .scss files, not in plain .css.

To fix:
- Use variables with $ inside your SCSS, e.g. background: $illini-orange;
- Make sure your build process is compiling

to main.css and you are linking the CSS file in your HTML.

For example, change:
```scss
background: illini-orange;
```
to:
```scss
background: $illini-orange;
```

Let me know if you want me to fix all variable usages in your file!

#navbar {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100px;
  background: #13294B;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center; 
  align-items: center;
  padding: 0 40px;
  z-index: 999;
}

.nav-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  width: 100%;
}

.nav-title {
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #fff;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
}

.nav-menu {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border-radius: 25px;
  padding: 8px 20px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-top: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.nav-menu li {
  margin: 0 10px;
}

.nav-menu a {
  display: block;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  font-size: 18px;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 15px;
  transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s;
}

.nav-menu a:hover {
    background: #ffca7b;
    color: white;
}
.nav-menu a.active {
  background: illini-orange;
  color: white;
}

#navbar.shrink {
    background: #13294B;
    height: 70px;
}
#navbar.shrink a {
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 16px;
}

#navbar.shrink .nav-title {
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 28px;
}

* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; 
}

section {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  font-size: 48px;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

h1 {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
  text-align: center;
  color: white;
}

p {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 2px;
}

#home::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-image: url("/./assets/uiucpic.jpg");
  background-attachment: fixed;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  filter: contrast(50%) saturate(110%);
  z-index: 1;
}

#home > * {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

#home p {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color:white;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

.fade-in-animation {
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease-out forwards;
}

@keyframes slideUp {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(40px);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.slide-up-animation {
  opacity: 0;
  animation: slideUp 1s 1s ease-out forwards;
}

#about {
  background: #FF5F05;
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-around;
  align-items: center;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding:20px;
}
.about li {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
  text-align: center;
  list-style-position: inside;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}

#about h1 {
  color: #13294B;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.about-text {
  margin: 0;
  flex: 1 1 320px;
  padding: 40px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.about-text i.fa-heart {
  display: block;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  font-size: 2.2rem;
}

#carousel {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

#carousel h1 {
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  color: #FF5F05;
}

.carousel {
  margin-top: 0px;
  position: relative;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 900px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  background: #fff;
}

.carousel__viewport {
  display: flex;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  scrollbar-width: none;
  -ms-overflow-style: none; 
}
.carousel__viewport::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none;
}

.carousel__slide {
  flex: 0 0 100%;
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
}

.carousel__slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
  gap: 12px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

#carousel .carousel__dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  margin: 0px 0 20px 0;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.carousel__dot {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border: 2px solid #FF5F05;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s, border 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
}

.carousel__dot.active {
  background: #FF5F05;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

#favs {
  padding: 2.5rem 0 2.5rem 0;
  background: #FF5F05;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  min-height: 0;
}

.favs-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 100vw;
  margin: 0 auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  max-width: 1100px;
}

.fav-card {
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  width: 90%;
  min-width: 0;
  aspect-ratio: 4/3;
  height:90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.fav-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.fav-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 150px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
}

#favs h2 {
  font-size: 1.7rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

#favs p {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color:black;
}

.fav-card .card-info {
  padding: 0.5rem 0.5rem 0.2rem 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}
 .fav-card .card-info h2 {
  font-size: 1.4rem !important;
  margin: 0.2rem 0 0.1rem 0;
  word-break: break-word;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
  @media (max-width: 900px) {
    .favs-grid {
      grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
    }
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .favs-grid {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      gap: 1rem;
      
    }
    .fav-card {
      max-width: 95vw;
      width: 98%;
      
    }
  }

  .modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    inset: 0;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    
  }

  .modal-content {
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    max-width: 500px;
    width: 90%;
    text-align: center;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 90vh;
    color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

    img {
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 0.5rem;
    }
  }

  .close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  #contact {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 40px 0;
  background: #fff;
  text-align: center;
}

.contact-container {
  display: flex;
  width: 80vw;
  max-width: 1200px;
  min-height: 60vh;
  margin: 0 auto;
  background: none;
  box-shadow: none;
}
.contact-left {
  flex: 1 1 0;
  background: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: flex-start;
  padding: 40px;
  min-width: 0;
  max-width: 350px;
  text-align: left;
  margin-right: 20px;
}
.contact-left h1 {
  color: #13294B;
  margin-bottom: 18px;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
}
.contact-text p {
  color: #13294B;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  justify-content: center;
}
.contact-email {
  font-weight: bold;
}
.contact-socials {
  margin-top: 18px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 18px;
}
.contact-socials a {
  color: #13294B !important;
  font-size: 2rem;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}
.contact-socials a:hover {
  color: #FF5F05 !important;
}
.contact-right {
  flex: 2 1 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 40px 0 40px 32px;
  min-width: 0;
  margin-left: 20px;
}
.contact-video-label {
  color: #13294B;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 18px;
  text-align: center;
}
.contact-video {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  min-width: 240px;
  height: 340px;
  background: #000;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
  object-fit: cover;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .contact-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    width: 98vw;
    min-height: unset;
    max-width: 98vw;
  }
  .contact-left, .contact-right {
    padding: 24px 0 0 0;
    max-width: 100vw;
    align-items: center;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .contact-right {
    padding: 0 0 24px 0;
  }
  .contact-video {
    width: 90vw;
    max-width: 98vw;
    height: 220px;
  }
}

#contact video {
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  background: #000;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
}

#contact p{
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color:#13294B;
  font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
  text-align: center;
}

  border-bottom: 4px solid #13294B;
}

.carousel__slide p {
  font-size: 1.5rem;

  color: #13294B;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.carousel__navigation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.carousel__navigation button {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
  gap: 12px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

#carousel .carousel__dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  margin: 0px 0 20px 0;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.carousel__dot {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  border: 2px solid #FF5F05;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s, border 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.10);
}

.carousel__dot.active {
  background: #FF5F05;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

#favs {

  min-height: 0;
}

.favs-grid {

  max-width: 1100px;
}

.fav-card {

}

.fav-card:hover {

}

.fav-card img {

#favs h2 {
  font-size: 1.7rem;

}

#favs p {

 .fav-card .card-info h2 {

toolCallRounds.response:
Your variables like $illini-orange are written in SCSS syntax, but you are using them in your CSS as background: illini-orange; (missing the $ and not inside a SCSS context). Also, if you are compiling to CSS, the output file will not have variables—they only work in .scss files, not in plain .css.

To fix:
- Use variables with $ inside your SCSS, e.g. background: $illini-orange;
- Make sure your build process is compiling main.scss to main.css and you are linking the CSS file in your HTML.

For example, change:
```scss
background: illini-orange;
```
to:
```scss
background: $illini-orange;
```

Let me know if you want me to fix all variable usages in your file!
